competitiveChoice.title: Build a Competitive Plan

Get started quickly by charging for items the same way other competitors do. Input device, user, number, and trunk rates and set usage mark-up percentages.

We'll handle the rest.

cascade.label: Aggregate counts across all sub-accounts
cascade.tooltip:
This powerful feature lets you decide whether to calculate pricing discounts based on the total number of items for all sub-accounts combined, or whether you want to treat each sub-account individually.

As an example, assume two sub-accounts have 5 devices each. When this option is checked, the system will calculate pricing based on the total of 10 devices, and any discounts for having 10 devices would be applied. When unchecked, the system will calculate pricing based on each account having 5 devices, and will then add the pricing together after calculating based on 5 devices.
cascade.help2: When checked, pricing and discount tiers are based on the total number of items across all sub-accounts.
cascade.help3: When unchecked, pricing is based on totals for each individual sub-account, and their total costs are then added together
